mapper.select: select notice_id, notice_title, notice_head_text, notice_head_image, notice_author, create_date, notice_count from notices where hospital_code = #{hospitalCode}
select notice_id, notice_title, notice_content, notice_head_text, notice_head_image, notice_author, create_date, notice_count, member_id from notices where notice_id = #{noticeId}
mapper.insert: insert into notices (notice_id, notice_title, notice_content, notice_author, create_date, hospital_code, member_code, notice_head_text, notice_head_image, notice_count) values (#{noticeId}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, #{noticeAuthor}, #{createDate}, #{hospitalCode}, #{memberCode}, #{noticeHeadText}, #{noticeHeadImage}, #{noticeCount})
mapper.select: select notice_id, notice_title, notice_head_text, notice_author, create_date from notices where notice_title LIKE '%'+#{noticeTitle}+'%'
mapper.update: update notices set notice_count = notice_count + 1 where notice_id=#{noticeId}
